definition: ورم warima يرم yarimu (waram) to be swollen; to swell, become swollen II to 1062 cause to swell, inflate (هـ s.th.) │ ورم انفه (anfahū) to annoy, vex, irritate, infuriate s.o.; ورم بأنفه (bi-anfihī) to be puffed up, conceited, stuck-up V = I ورم waram pl. اورام aurām swelling, intumescence, tumor │ في انفه ورم (anfihī) he is stuck-up
